# summarize score
result = mean(scores)
print(' > Model[%s] %.3f' % (key, result))
return (key, result)
# grid search configs
def grid_search(data, cfg_list, n_test):
# evaluate configs
scores = scores = [repeat_evaluate(data, cfg, n_test) for cfg in cfg_list]
# sort configs by error, asc
scores.sort(key=lambda tup: tup[1])
return scores

data = series.values
